Mapping the waters around our state will provide valuable information on critical minerals and coastal resources while supporting safer shipping in the #Arctic.

Only a small part of the #Arctic has been charted to modern standards, hindering the safety of maritime operations. This Presidential directive builds on my own efforts to secure strong funding for @NOAA's hydrographic surveys to address the backlog of Arctic charting needs.

The #Arctic in particular is crucial to our nation‚Äôs geopolitical, economic, and environmental well-being. Our waters are home to an abundant variety of untapped natural resources that can be used for food, medicine, and energy.

.@POTUS recently directed federal agencies to map the shoreline & nearshore of Alaska & the U.S. exclusive economic zone. This is an important step for AK, especially for the #Arctic as we are woefully behind in developing up-to-date maps for the region. https://www.murkowski.senate.gov/press/release/delegation-applauds-presidential-memo-on-alaska-mapping
